  • Method Details

    • handleHelloServer

      public void handleHelloServer​(Server server, ClientHandler clientHandler, HelloServerBody helloServerBody)
      When the server receives HelloServer from the client, it replies with HelloClient. Gives a client an ID, and sends a Welcome message. It replies with Alive message to the client. Inform the player itself about all other players that have been added, and send their status.
      Parameters:
      server - The Server
      clientHandler - The ClientHandler of the Server
      helloServerBody - The message body of the JSON message

    • handlePlayerValues

      public void handlePlayerValues​(Server server, ClientHandler clientHandler, PlayerValuesBody playerValuesBody)
      Inform all players about the player that has been added and send its status. It send the username and figure of the player. Send an error message to the player if the figure is taken.
      Parameters:
      server - The Server
      clientHandler - The ClientHandler of the Server
      playerValuesBody - The message body of the JSON message

    • handleSendChat

      public void handleSendChat​(Server server, ClientHandler clientHandler, SendChatBody sendChatBody)
      Send a private chat or public chat depends on what the player sends to the server.
      Parameters:
      server - The Server
      clientHandler - The ClientHandler of the Server
      sendChatBody - The message body of the JSON message

    • handleAlive

      public void handleAlive​(Server server, ClientHandler clientHandler, AliveBody aliveBody)
      Send Alive-Message to the client after the server receives Alive-Message.
      Parameters:
      server - The Server
      clientHandler - The ClientHandler of the Server
      aliveBody - The message body of the JSON message

    • handleSetStatus

      public void handleSetStatus​(Server server, ClientHandler clientHandler, SetStatusBody setStatusBody)
      Inform all other players when a player changes his status to ready or not ready. Then it sends SelectMap message to the first ready player
      Parameters:
      server - The Server
      clientHandler - The ClientHandler of the Server
      setStatusBody - The message body of the JSON message

    • handleMapSelected

      public void handleMapSelected​(Server server, ClientHandler clientHandler, MapSelectedBody mapSelectedBody) throws IOException
      When a client chooses a map, the server informs all other players about it. Then it checks
      Parameters:
      server - The Server
      clientHandler - The ClientHandler of the Server
      mapSelectedBody - The message body of the JSON message
      Throws:
      IOException

    • handleSetStartingPoint

      public void handleSetStartingPoint​(Server server, ClientHandler clientHandler, SetStartingPointBody setStartingPointBody)
      The player sends his coordinates for the starting point, and the server sends a JSON message to all the players and inform them about the starting point. The server sends the current player to choose a starting point to all the players. If a player chooses a taken point, the server throws an error.
      Parameters:
      server - The Server
      clientHandler - The ClientHandler of the Server
      setStartingPointBody - The message body of the JSON message

    • handleSelectedCard

      public void handleSelectedCard​(Server server, ClientHandler clientHandler, SelectedCardBody selectedCardBody)
      The player send the selected card from hand deck. The server adds the card to the register, if the first card in the first deck is Again, the server throws an error to the player. If the selection is successful the server send the selected to all the players. After the selection is finished the server starts the timer.
      Parameters:
      server - The Server
      clientHandler - The ClientHandler of the Server
      selectedCardBody - The message body of the JSON message

    • handlePlayCard

      public void handlePlayCard​(Server server, ClientHandler clientHandler, PlayCardBody playCardBody)
      When a player plays a card the server checks if the it's the turn of the player, then it checks if the player has the card in register, and if everything is okay, the server activates the card effect and sends the played card to all other players. Then it informs all the players about the next player. If all the players played there turn, the server gets the new register so the players can play it. If all registers are already played, the server starts a new round.
      Parameters:
      server - The Server
      clientHandler - The ClientHandler of the Server
      playCardBody - The message body of the JSON message

    • handleRebootDirection

      public void handleRebootDirection​(Server server, ClientHandler clientHandler, RebootDirectionBody rebootDirectionBody)
      The player send the requested direction after he reboots. The server saves the direction and the player in Hash Map.
      Parameters:
      server - The Server
      clientHandler - The ClientHandler of the Server
      rebootDirectionBody - The message body of the JSON message

    • handleSelectedDamage

      public void handleSelectedDamage​(Server server, ClientHandler clientHandler, SelectedDamageBody selectedDamageBody)
      If there is no more spam cards in the spam the deck, the the player has to choose a damage card. The player sends to the server the requested damage card, then the server checks if there is enough cards of that type, if not the server throws an error to the user, and sends again PickDamage to the player.
      Parameters:
      server - The Server
      clientHandler - The ClientHandler of the Server
      selectedDamageBody - The message body of the JSON message

    • handleBuyUpgrade

      public void handleBuyUpgrade​(Server server, ClientHandler clientHandler, BuyUpgradeBody buyUpgradeBody)
      Parameters:
      server - The Server
      clientHandler - The ClientHandler of the Server
      buyUpgradeBody - The message body of the JSON message

    • handleChooseRegister

      public void handleChooseRegister​(Server server, ClientHandler clientHandler, ChooseRegisterBody chooseRegisterBody)
      This method is activated after a player plays Admin Privilege card. The server checks if the player has the card, and if yes it sends all the players RegisterChosen.
      Parameters:
      server - The Server
      clientHandler - The ClientHandler of the Server
      chooseRegisterBody - The message body of the JSON message

    • handleReturnCards

      public void handleReturnCards​(Server server, ClientHandler clientHandler, ReturnCardsBody returnCardsBody)
      This method is activated after the player plays Memory Swap. The server removes the returned cards that the player sends, and then it sends to the player YourCards message with the new cards.
      Parameters:
      server - The Server
      clientHandler - The ClientHandler of the Server
      returnCardsBody - The message body of the JSON message
